column5: Due to an unforeseen schedule conflict we, reluctantly, had to give up the week of August 14th at Lac Charlotte. We're hoping some lucky anglers will take our week. Last August at Charlotte my group of 4 caught northern pike to 44 inches and over 500 walleye. We have fished with other outfitters, but Air Tamarac is the best. The cabin is but 3 years old and the only one on the lake - so it's your private domain. Check out Air Tamarac's website and contact them if you're interested.
